description: {"blocks":[{"key":"7osba","text":"This protocol provides the methodology of vagotomy procedure and tamoxifen injections in a murine model, investigating the pathological role of alpha-synuclein in the gastrointestinal (GI) system. The mouse model includes features of exclusive expression of alpha-synuclein in cholecystokinin (CCK) cells within the gut.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bns34","text":"The protocol intricately details the surgical procedure, including a dissection of the vagus node to ensure the mice not only survive but thrive post-surgery. Subsequent tamoxifen injections, utilizing a tamoxifen-inducible promoter, aim to induce the expression of alpha-synuclein.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5gbf","text":"The significance of this protocol lies in presenting a unified and standardized procedure for both vagotomy and tamoxifen injections. This streamlined approach is crucial for investigating the role of alpha-synuclein in the GI system.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"avkm6","text":"Materials","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7kkh3","text":"Syringe","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b5ogc","text":"Needles","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"de7sv","text":"Scalpels","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"906gc","text":"Ketamine","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d3v1r","text":"Xylazine","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"882jq","text":"Bupivacaine","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4cb57","text":"Buprenorphine hydrochloride ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1gjdb","text":"Tamoxifen","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2a11k","text":"Corn oil ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"t39d","text":"Stainless steel wound clips (MikRon Precision Inc)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4o9nl","text":"Perform surgical subdiaphragmatic vagotomy in 1-month-old male and female SNCAbow;Vil-CreERT2 mice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3be9t","text":"Prior to surgery, sterilize all surgical instruments. Use syringe, needles, sutures, and scalpels from sterile packs, open it at the time of the operation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fkt35","text":"Sterilize dissecting instruments before using on the next mouse.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fvlos","text":"Surgeon washed their hands thoroughly for   before donning sterile gloves.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":42,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"12c24","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"18DD2180DDBF11ECB8C289C1D9A715A2","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ckc5d","text":"Surgeon maintained a sterile operating field during the operation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a1bmn","text":"Apply lubricant eye ointment to mouse eyes to prevent corneal drying.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6j4kq","text":"Anesthetize mice with ketamine/xylazine at a dose of 87/13 mg/kg by intraperitoneal injection. Determine adequate anesthesia by lack of movement, lack of response to tail pinch, and lack of whisker twitching.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"clkt3","text":"Administer buprenorphine   subcutaneously before the surgery.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":25,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"euhko","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.05","error":false,"guid":"28F18920DDC011ECB8C289C1D9A715A2","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1910}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bkeum","text":"After initial anesthesia, place the mouse on top of a heating pad lined with a silicone pad within the stereotactic apparatus field. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eklan","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4o5o9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":47}],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":4,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"c1b47","text":"Note: Maintain heating pad at a temperature of  .","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"5D85C094DDC011ECB8730A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"temperature"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bhnfv","text":"Make a mid-line incision with scissors to expose the abdominal contents.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"casvd","text":"Immediately below the diaphragm, identify the vagus nerve and isolate it from surrounding connective tissue and vessels.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"316hq","text":" Excise 2 mm section of the vagus nerve.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8s4s","text":"Monitor mice for intra-operatively signs of arousal. Continuously monitor mouse breathing throughout the surgery by observing chest wall movement.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eqk25","text":"Close the laparotomy in two layers with suturing and surgical clips. Suture the inner layer of skin with a continuous suture pattern using 5-0 monofilament absorbable suture and close the outer skin with 9 mm stainless steel wound clips (MikRon Precision Inc).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2ep2t","text":"Apply analgesic bupivacaine (1-2 drops) to the incision site after suturing and allow the animals to awaken.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4gntd","text":"Following surgery, assess mice every   until they return to baseline level of activity with no signs of breathing complications or lasting motor deficits.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":37,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4qe1u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"8BF66490DDC111ECB8C289C1D9A715A2","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ai72k","text":"Record the well-being of the mice in the post-surgery monitoring log. Postoperatively, give mice analgesics.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"21omh","text":"Administer mice analgesics (buprenorphine hydrochloride at a dose of  ) and observe daily for 5 days for any signs of infection, distress, or changes in behavior.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":69,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"e9dvn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.05","error":false,"guid":"28B8E590DDC311ECB8C289C1D9A715A2","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1910}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cv50j","text":"Give mice free access to food and water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"caeje","text":"In sham-operated animals, perform abdominal laparotomy, and expose the vagus nerve but do not excise it.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"brh4l","text":"Weight loss of ~15% was noted in mice undergoing vagotomy compared to sham surgery.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bjds7","text":"One week after surgery, treat mice with tamoxifen dissolved in corn oil ( ) or vehicle administer by intraperitoneal injection daily for five days.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":73,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2k13k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"3BECC790DDC211ECB8C289C1D9A715A2","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1910}}}}

title: Vagotomy and Tamoxifen treatment
